MeltingTemperatureAnalysis.Name: Melting Temperature Analysis
MeltingTemperatureAnalysis.Description: Calculates the melting temperature of the PCR primer and compares it with the optimum.

MeltingTemperatureDifferenceAnalysis.Name: Melting Temperature Difference
MeltingTemperatureDifferenceAnalysis.Description: Identifies melting temperature differences between the PCR primers.

GCContentAnalysis.Name: GC Content Analysis
GCContentAnalysis.Description: Calculates the deviation of GC content between PCR primers and amplicon.

MisprimingAnalysis.Name: Mispriming Analysis
MisprimingAnalysis.Description: Identifies alternate annealing sites for the PCR primer on the DNA template.

ComplementarityAnalysis.Name: Complementarity Analysis
ComplementarityAnalysis.Description: Identifies low complementarity for the PCR primer.

HairpinLoopAnalysis.Name: Hairpin Loop Analysis
HairpinLoopAnalysis.Description: Investigates possible hairpin structures on the PCR primer.

Temperature.name: Temperature used in delta G calculations

PrimerEndStabilityAnalysis.Name: Primer End Stability Analysis
PrimerEndStabilityAnalysis.Description: Compares the stability between the 3'-end and the 5'-end on the PCR primer.

PCRPrimerCombinationAnalysis.Name: PCR Primer Combination Analysis
PCRPrimerCombinationAnalysis.Description: Combines forward and reverse PCR primers into PCR primer pairs.

AmpliconLengthAnalysis.Name: Amplicon Length Analysis
AmpliconLengthAnalysis.Description: Checks the deviation of the amplicon length from the optimum length.

MeltingTemperatureAnalysis.Name: Melting Temperature Analysis
MeltingTemperatureAnalysis.Description: Calculates the melting temperature of the sequencing primer and compares it with the optimum.

ComplementarityAnalysis.Name: Complementarity Analysis

HairpinLoopAnalysis.Name: Hairpin Loop Analysis
HairpinLoopAnalysis.Description: Investigates possible hairpin structures on the sequencing primer.

TargetDistanceAnalysis.Name: Target Distance Analysis
TargetDistanceAnalysis.Description: Show warnings if sequencing primer is located outside the target distance settings.

S2AAnalysis.Description: Evaluation of the sequence to analyze.

HomopolymerAnalysis.Name: Homopolymer Analysis
HomopolymerAnalysis.Description: Checks homopolymer sequence adjacent to target polymorphism.

PolymorphismAnalysis.Name: A-nucleotide Analysis
PolymorphismAnalysis.Description: Checks for A in target polymorphism.

PrimerSetDesign.Description: Analysis of a complete set of primers including a PCR primer pair and a sequencing primer.
